bibl.title: Spätantike und mittelalterliche Vierstützenkirchen in Ägypten.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Offers an architectural analysis of a late antique and medieval type of church characterized by a naos with four pillars or columns supporting the roof. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, Spätantike und mittelalterliche Vierstützenkirchen in Ägypten.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 139-147, 2 figg.
Offers an architectural analysis of a late antique and medieval type of church characterized by a naos with four pillars or columns supporting the roof. - Avec résumé en anglais.
